#summary Introduction to the Development Guide for epiClock
#labels Featured

= Introduction =
This wiki is designed to be a guide for developers who wish to learn more about, extend, or contribute to the epiClock project, as well as a user guide describing the features of epiClock. 

= Guides =
There are two types of guides in this wiki. The [User_Guide User Guide] and the [Developer_Guide Developer Guide].

== Developer Guide ==
  * [dev_design Understanding epiClock] - Major overview of the epiClock's structure
  * [dev_obj_epiClock epiClock Manager] - Overview of the epiClock Manager
  * [dev_obj_clock epiClock Clock Object] - Major overview of the Clock Object
  * [dev_obj_face epiClock Face Object] - Major overview of the Face Object

== User Guide ==
  * [user_quick Quick Start] - The basics you need to know to deploy an epiClock
  * [user_advanced Advanced Guide] - The features of an epiClock
  * [user_image Image Guide] - Everything you need to know about creating your own image clock
